location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging a communication from the Resident, dated 19 May 1819, regarding the family of Hajee Khuleel Khan [H훮jj카 Qul카 Kh훮n]. It refers the Resident to a letter sent to him, dated 3 June 1819, for guidance on the subject.
